
\color{blue}

**Solution**:
In this model, $b_0$ corresponds to the sample mean sales of Electronic Arts, which is equal to $m_2 = 0.41361$. On the other hand, $b_0 + b_1$ corresponds to the sample mean for Activision, which is equal to $m_1 = 0.44124$. We therefore have $b_1 = m_1 - m_2 = 0.44124 - 0.41361$
